code:
class Solution:
    def convertRoman(self, n):
        #Code here
        st=""
        var=[1000, 900, 500, 400,100, 90, 50, 40,10, 9, 5, 4,1]
        s=["M","CM","D","CD","C","XC","L","XL","X","IX","V","IV","I"]
        i=0
        while(n):
            
            for _ in range(n//var[i]):
                st+=s[i]
                n-=var[i]
            i+=1    
        return st

#User function template for Python 3

class Solution:
    def convertRoman(self, n):
        #Code here
        st=""
        var=[1000, 900, 500, 400,100, 90, 50, 40,10, 9, 5, 4,1]
        s=["M","CM","D","CD","C","XC","L","XL","X","IX","V","IV","I"]
        i=0
        while(n):
            
            for _ in range(n//var[i]):
                st+=s[i]
                n-=var[i]
            i+=1    
        return st
